minds.welcome: Welcome to MINDS (Material Interaction Decoupling and Scientific insight extraction)! I am your knowledge-mining agent designed to bridge data-driven modeling with interpretable materials science. Please select a specialized module or ask me directly about materials research.
minds.placeholder: Describe your materials research challenge or ask about composite design...

welcome.title: Hello! I'm MatterAI, your reliable research partner
welcome.description: Focused on materials research and development. I can assist you with materials design, performance analysis, process optimization, machine learning modeling, theoretical calculations, and more. Let's explore the infinite possibilities of materials science together!
welcome.exampleTitle: You can try the following materials research questions

lithiumBattery.title: Lithium Battery Material Synthesis
lithiumBattery.description: How to synthesize high-performance silicon nanowire anode materials?

alloyAnalysis.title: Alloy Performance Analysis
alloyAnalysis.description: Analyze the mechanical properties of Ti-6Al-4V titanium alloy

ceramicOptimization.title: Ceramic Material Optimization
ceramicOptimization.description: Optimize alumina ceramic sintering process parameters using active learning algorithms

dataCollection.description: Collect and organize structured data on lithium battery materials from literature

characterization.description: Calculate DOS properties of NiO nanoparticles using VASP
